ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Easy way to get plat?
ygData.msgSnippet: You can kill them at 35, its just hard to pull them at 35.  Oasis is bugged, try using fear in different places.  The mobs will stop all together and you can
ygData.messageBody:
You can kill them at 35, its just hard to pull them at 35.  Oasis is bugged, try using fear in different places.  The mobs will stop all together and you can just nuke and melee away.
 
Mu
-----Original Message-----
From: alexander.jones@... [mailto:alexander.jones@...]
Sent: Friday, August 03, 2001 4:37 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Easy way to get plat?

Talking about specs, has anyone tried to solo specs at 35 with a cleric?
 
 
-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]
Sent: den 3 augusti 2001 16:35
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Easy way to get plat?

Slaughtered, or no exp one of the two. 
 
Mu
-----Original Message-----
From: Denis Baldwin [mailto:dbaldwin@...]
Sent: Friday, August 03, 2001 4:33 PM
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Easy way to get plat?

Well, I was thinking of group against specs. What do you think of that? Good choice @ 19? or will I get slaughtered?
 
Denis

-----Original Message-----
From: Richard Ong [mailto:nakor@...]
Sent: Friday, August 03, 2001 10:16 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Easy way to get plat?

Generally speaking, you don't get as much money when you solo.  You
get a lot more money when you group.  Sure, you probably don't get
everything for yourself but because the groups can pull fast and
kill 'em, you generally get more money that way even if you are doing
alpha looting.  If you can get into a group, you probably can make
money that way.  Try the aviaks group in SK.  You can probably do it
at 19.  And yeah, Lena's correct, if you can get a few more levels
you can group in paw or whatever cuz they drop a lot of FS weapons. 
Though, killing gnolls can get really boring after a while.

--- In EverQuest@y..., Denis Baldwin <dbaldwin@c...> wrote:
> I'm a 19 Warrior and I need more plat. What's the easiest way for
me to get
> it Soloing? I'm in the commonlands right now...
